ComicInfo.Title: Pit of Death pt. 2- Agent of Hell
ComicInfo.Summary:
"A man alone, trapped in the perilous labyrinth beneath Castle Dracula, surrounded by the seven brides of darkness! The pulse-pounding conclusion to PIT OF DEATH!
The next blood-curdling chapter in our classic adaptation of Bram Stoker's DRACULA!
Angel O'Hara received the maniac's phone call... but it was Lilith, Daughter of Dracula that answered!"
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-15 19:15:33. [CVDB15145] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 08:28:32. [Issue ID 15145]
